amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 9012 which prohibits funds in the bill from being used by the Government of the United States to enter into a basing rights agreement between the United States and Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 9012 (relating to a basing rights agreement between the United States and Iraq).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 50 - 376 (Roll no. 296).
